description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) SEGA's classic arcade racer returns. Experience multiplayer OutRun via Live Arcade. Race 10 Ferraris on 15 challenging courses, all in stunning Hi-Definition for the first time. OutRun Online Arcade - it's a beautiful journey. This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: SEGA's classic arcade racer returns... experience multiplayer OutRun™ via Xbox LIVE Arcade. Race 10 Ferraris on 15 challenging courses, all in stunning Hi-Definition for the first time. OutRun™ Online Arcade - it's a beautiful journey.
